title: Minecraft: Windows 10 版 Beta 0.12.0.1 发布
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-12 10:58 编辑 

UPDATE: this is actually changelog 0.12.0.1 not 0.12.1.0! Blame our silly number bot (who has now been recycled) for any confusion. The patch also includes x86/32-bit support, which wasn’t mentioned in our earlier post.
更新：这是0.12.0.1的更新列表，不是0.12.1.0（0.12.2.0）！这都怪我们的计数器出了问题造成的误解（它已经被回收）。这个更新也包含x86/32位支持，这在之前没有提到。
（Mojang你够了）

Notable improvements & bug fixes
改进与BUG修复

Real fullscreen now enabled启用真正的全屏Sprinting should work like PC疾跑像PC版一样了Make FOV changeable使得视角可变




Other things
其它的东西
Added x86 / 32-bit support加入x86/32位的支持Anvil UI works better- you can access the main UI while renaming/repairing & can place items in the second slot铁毡的UI更棒了——你可以在重命名和修复时访问主UI并且可以在第二个槽中放置物品
Minecarts don’t disappear when you enter the nether在进入下界时矿车不会消失“Repopulation” achievement fixed修复“种族恢复”成就Squid able to be pulled with a fishing rod钓鱼竿可以吊起鱿鱼Creative world saves can be imported to the Trial version创造世界存档可以导入到试用版Nether brick slab now craftable下界半砖可以合成了You can keep chatting with your friends when you get on a boat在船上时也可以聊天Fixed spawning/respawning in the Nether & in flat worlds修复重生在下界和在超平坦世界的问题Mining emerald ore fixed for correct pickaxe types修复绿宝石挖掘使用的镐子的问题Custom skins tab fixed修复自定义皮肤选项卡Enchanted books now include enchantment names附魔书包含附魔名Fixed scenario where writing signs would cause the game to crash修复在一些地方写告示牌会导致游戏崩溃的问题Fixed issues with furnaces & chests not working修复熔炉和箱子不工作的问题Fixed crashes when players repeatedly entered & left the Nether修复玩家反复进出下界时崩溃的问题Audio file fixes音频文件修复Fixed crashes for players with non-ASCII characters in names.修复玩家名称为非ASCII码时崩溃Fixed world progress saved game issue.修复保存世界的问题


BUG汇报：
http://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE
反馈：
http://minecraft.uservoice.com/
